Name: Absorb Bulb
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Atk if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

Name: Adamant Orb
Description: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves when it is held.

Name: Air Balloon
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder will float in the air until hit. Once the holder is hit, this item will burst.

Name: Aloraichium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Alolan Raichu's Thunderbolt to an exclusive Z-Move.

Name: Amulet Coin
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles any prize money received if the holding Pokémon joins a battle.

Name: Assault Vest
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

Name: Berry Sweet
Description: A berry-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

Name: Berserk Gene
Description: Boosts ATTACK but causes confusion.

Name: Big Root
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the amount of HP the holder restores from HP-stealing moves.

Name: Binding Band
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a band that increases the power of binding moves used by the holder.

Name: Black Belt
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This belt helps the wearer to focus and boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

Name: Black Glasses
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a pair of shady-looking glasses that boost the power of Dark-type moves.

Name: Black Sludge
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It gradually restores HP to Poison-type Pokémon. It damages any other type.

Name: Blue Orb
Description: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.

Name: Blue Scarf
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Beauty aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

Name: Blunder Policy
Description: Raises Speed sharply when a Pokémon misses with a move because of accuracy.

Name: Bright Powder
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It casts a tricky glare that lowers the opposing Pokémon's accuracy.

Name: Bug Gem
Description: A gem with an insect-like essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Bug-type move one time.

Name: Bug Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Bug-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Buginium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Bug-type moves to Bug-type Z-Moves.

Name: Burn Drive
Description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Genesect's Techno Blast move so it becomes Fire type.

Name: Cell Battery
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if the holder is hit with an Electric-type attack. It can only be used once.

Name: Charcoal
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

Name: Chill Drive
Description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Genesect's Techno Blast move so it becomes Ice type.

Name: Choice Band
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious headband boosts Attack but only allows the use of one move.

Name: Choice Scarf
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious scarf boosts Speed but only allows the use of one move.

Name: Choice Specs
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These curious glasses boost Sp. Atk but only allow the use of one move.

Name: Cleanse Tag
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the head of the party.

Name: Clover Sweet
Description: A clover-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

Name: Damp Rock
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Rain Dance when used by the holder.

Name: Dark Gem
Description: A gem with an essence of darkness. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dark-type move one time.

Name: Dark Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Dark-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Darkinium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Dark-type moves to Dark-type Z-Moves.

Name: Decidium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Decidueye's Spirit Shackle to an exclusive Z-Move.

Name: Deep Sea Scale
Description: An item to be held by Clamperl. This scale shines with a faint pink and raises the holder's Sp. Def stat.

Name: Deep Sea Tooth
Description: An item to be held by Clamperl. This fang gleams a sharp silver and raises the holder's Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Destiny Knot
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the opposing Pokémon will be, too.

Name: Douse Drive
Description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Genesect's Techno Blast move so it becomes Water type.

Name: Draco Plate
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

Name: Dragon Fang
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This hard and sharp fang boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

Name: Dragon Gem
Description: A gem with a draconic essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dragon-type move one time.

Name: Dragon Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Dragon-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Dragonium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Dragon-type moves to Dragon-type Z-Moves.

Name: Dread Plate
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dark-type moves.

Name: Dubious Disc
Description: A transparent device overflowing with dubious data. Its producer is unknown.

Name: Earth Plate
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

Name: Eevium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Eevee's Last Resort to an exclusive Z-Move.

Name: Eject Button
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit by an attack, it will be switched out of battle.

Name: Eject Pack
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder's stats are lowered, it will be switched out of battle.

Name: Electirizer
Description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of electric energy. It's loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Electric Gem
Description: A gem with an essence of electricity. When held, it strengthens the power of an Electric-type move one time.

Name: Electric Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Electric-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Electric Terrain. It can only be used once.

Name: Electrium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Electric-type moves to Electric-type Z-Moves.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A Pokémon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.

Name: Eviolite
Description: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held by a Pokémon that can still evolve, it raises both Defense and Sp. Def.

Name: Exp. Share
Description: Turning on this special device will allow all the Pokémon on your team to receive Exp. Points from battles.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of supereffective moves.

Name: Fairium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Fairy-type moves to Fairy-type Z-Moves.

Description: A memory disc that contains Fire-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Fire-type moves to Fire-type Z-Moves.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

Name: Flame Orb

Name: Flame Plate
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This very light stone reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.

Name: Flying Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Flying-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Flyinium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Flying-type moves to Flying-type Z-Moves.

Name: Focus Band
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder may endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just 1 HP.

Name: Focus Sash
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder has full HP, it will endure a potential KO attack with 1 HP. The item then disappears.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense makes the holder bloated and slow moving.

Description: A gem with a spectral essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ghost-type move one time.

Description: A memory disc that contains Ghost-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Grip Claw
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of multi-turn attacks, such as Bind and Wrap.

Name: Griseous Orb
Description: A glowing orb to be held by Giratina. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves when it is held.

Name: Ground Gem

Name: Ground Memory

Name: Groundium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Ground-type moves to Ground-type Z-Moves.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Sunny Day when used by the holder.

Name: Heavy-Duty Boots
Description: These boots prevent the effects of traps set on the battlefield.

Name: Ice Gem
Description: A gem with an essence of ice. When held, it strengthens the power of an Ice-type move one time.

Name: Ice Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Ice-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ice-type moves.

Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Ice-type moves to Ice-type Z-Moves.

Name: Incinium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Incineroar's Darkest Lariat to an exclusive Z-Move.

Name: Insect Plate
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Bug-type moves.

Name: Iron Ball
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It lowers Speed and allows Ground-type moves to hit Flying types and holders that are levitating.

Name: Iron Plate
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Steel-type moves.

Name: King's Rock
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.

Name: Kommonium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Kommo-o's Clanging Scales to an exclusive Z-Move.

Name: Lagging Tail
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.

Name: Lax Incense
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The beguiling aroma of this incense may cause attacks to miss its holder.

Name: Leek

Name: Leftovers

Name: Life Orb
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

Name: Light Ball
Description: An item to be held by Pikachu. It's a puzzling orb that boosts its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Name: Light Clay
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Protective moves like Light Screen and Reflect will be effective longer.

Name: Love Sweet
Description: A heart-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles any prize money received if the holding Pokémon joins a battle.

Name: Lucky Egg
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's an egg filled with happiness that earns the holder extra Exp. Points in battle.

Name: Lucky Punch
Description: An item to be held by Chansey. This pair of lucky boxing gloves will boost Chansey's critical-hit ratio.

Name: Luminous Moss
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

Name: Lunalium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Lunala's Moongeist Beam to an exclusive Z-Move.

Name: Lustrous Orb

Name: Lycanium Z
Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Lycanroc's Stone Edge to an exclusive Z-Move.

Name: Macho Brace
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This stiff, heavy brace helps Pokémon grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.

Name: Magmarizer
Description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of magma energy. It's loved by a certain Pokémon.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

Name: Metal Coat
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a special metallic film that can boost the power of Steel-type moves.

Name: Metal Powder

Name: Metronome

Description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Mew's Psychic to an exclusive Z-Move.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves.

Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This thick pair of glasses slightly boosts the power of special moves.

Name: Yellow Scarf
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Tough aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

Name: Zap Plate
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.

Name: Zoom Lens
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after its target moves, its accuracy will be boosted.
